Underwater exploration would become more accessible and efficient, allowing us to explore deeper and more remote areas of the ocean.
We could potentially establish underwater communities and cities, opening up new opportunities for living and working.
Underwater agriculture could be developed, allowing us to grow food in the ocean and reduce our reliance on land.
Underwater transportation could be improved, allowing us to travel faster and more efficiently between different parts of the world.
The underwater environment could be used for new forms of renewable energy, such as hydrothermal vents and underwater tidal power.
